job.title: data scientist, People Analytics - Remote
job.description: ltstronggtltugtJob Summary And MissionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThis job contributes to Starbucks success by guiding business decisions through utilizing data analysis and consulting data elements to unlock the opportunities to support our global business Models and acts in accordance with Starbucks guiding principlesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtSummary Of Key into business processes and ensures appropriate testing takes place ltligtltligtDevelops project proposals gains stakeholder buyin and ensures timelines are met ltligtltligtPromotes and advocates value of advanced analytics to solve business problems within department ltligtltligtMentors data analysts in descriptive and predictive analytics ltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequired Knowledge Skills And AbilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtAbility to apply knowledge of multidisciplinary business principles and practices to achieve successful outcomes in crossfunctional projects and in several analytic languages R SAS SPSS Stata ltligtltligtBig data processing techniques preferredltligtltligtRetail customer loyalty and eCommerce experience preferredltbrgtltligtltulgtStarbucks and
